评论详情: A little stiff. They look more expensive than they cost. Hoping they become more comfortable.

I was shocked at how comfortable these shoes are! They definitely give Chanel vibes ! They are true to size. They look expensive but are a great value for the money! Im a true size 6 and i ordered a 6. They fit perfectly! I love these shoes!
I really like the way these look! The back strap doesn’t stay on very well for me but I’m not sure if that’s a me problem or an issue with the shoe. Still cute and so I wear even with the slippage
I usually end up returning most of the clothes and shoes from Amazon due to low quality.  These shoes are the exception.  Great quality and fit!
one of my most comfortable pairs of shoes and I always get compliments on them!

评论概述: Not as snug as I expected
评论详情: Amazing quality but the shoes keep slipping off! I usually use a double tape to put the thing in place.

I bought this pair in May 2023 and wore them for the first time today.  I know they’re made of faux leather but I was not expecting them to peel this soon.  They were very beautiful when they arrived and packaged very well. Also, the first time I tried them they were very uncomfortable.  I did not return them because I thought they just needed breaking-in. They are now totally useless and a waste of money.
Do they look nice? Sure. They are not made to walk in. They fit oddly. Back is loose. Front is tight. I only use these when it’s necessary.

I think these shoes are stunning. I am always skeptical buying without first trying because I have always worn a size 9 but since I gained a little weight my feet have gotten bigger. Ordered a 9.5 and they fit perfectly. I love the strappy heel. Very glamorous and comfy.

Unfortunately the strap was too loose for me and is not adjustable. The vinyl inside the right shoe came cracked at the ball of foot bend area and was grabbing my foot. Returning.. Too bad, very cute , good height.
Look sleek and perfect fit. Great heel for walking on gravel and uneven terrain. Definitely a good value.

评论概述: Don’t order if You’re in a Hurry to get!
评论详情: Almost cancelled order when I hadn’t received the package after almost 2 weeks … but it came on the 14th day. Was actually pleasantly surprised at the quality and fit. They were worth waiting for.
Style and comfort..I'm glad I bought them.
True to size
I love these (Chanel inspired!) heels! I can walk in them all day and they’re very comfortable and very stylish!
Can’t wear. Purchased 8.5 which is my true size but they are too small and hurt my feet! Size up!

评论概述: Poor quality, the product shipped to me was obviously a return from someone else.
评论详情: When I opened the box with the shoes, one shoe had stuffing in the toes, a plastic wrap around the back strap and a white fabric bag on the shoe.  The other shoe had none of those, as if someone had tried it on and returned it.  The quality of the shoe was not great, but for the price I didn't expect Chanel quality, but the shoe is very wide, and therefore the fit is poor and gaps at the toe and on the sides.  I returned immediately.  Do not recommend.
Stylish & comfortable.

I really like the look of these shoes and wear them almost everyday. However, I am constantly pulling up the straps on these shoes. Have been since the day I started wearing them and there is no way to tighten the strap.
Adorable shoes. They look just like the picture. The color and height are on point. However, the strap is loose. I had to return them.
It's super cute and so far it's fell pretty comfortable
These shoes are a great Channel dupe. Very comfortable & good quality. Fit perfect!
These shoes are ok.  If you look closely, they are cheaply made.  But can't beat the price.
I’m a 7.5 and while these are a good quality for the price and very cute, I wish the heel strap was adjustable. It was way too big for me. My heel kept slipping out. Had to take them to a cobbler.

评论概述: True to size, but strap runs large!
评论详情: I ended up returning these shoes because the strap was way too large (about ½ in). The shoe fit perfectly, seemed comfortable, and was super cute, but there was no way it was going to stay on my foot! Just a note, the soles seemed like they would need to be scuffed up before wearing - they were very slippery on my floors! I'm disappointed that I had to return these.
Most light weight and comfortable shoe.
Se ve de poca calidad y corre grande. No me quedó la talla que pedí.
I love these but it hurts my feet. Not in a heels way more in a comfort/fitting way.

*UPDATE*  The seller contacted me and offered a full refund to make things right. Review changed to 5 stars for this.I ordered this shoe with the heel - which is the only option - but somehow it came as a flat?  Very weird, so minus 2 stars for that.  It's comfortable and very cute, so I'm keeping the flat, but really wanted the heel :(
Me encantaron los use todo un día y no molestan los dedos. Me sorprendió la calidad y la suela. Mi pie mide 25cm y me quedó exacto. Tome un 8.5 . No se baja la tira pero tampoco aprieta.
Honestly I wanted to love these. They are so cute and I got so many compliments but they literally cut into the side of my foot. It was horrible. I was in pain for days.

These were so cute! I got a ton of compliments on them. Very stylish I look forward to wearing them a lot. I work at a church worked both services wearing these shoes and they are pretty comfortable!!!

评论概述: They look high end like Chanel and they are super comfortable !
评论详情: Love these ! Super high end looking and comfortable. Getting all three colors .

评论概述: Comfortable on the first day of wearing!
评论详情: I was blown away by how comfortable these shoes are. I didn’t get a chance to break them in before going on a trip. On the first day of wearing,I did 5000 steps (travel + office walking). No blister and no pain! I read all the positive reviews so I was hoping for that outcome but I was still impressed by how comfortable they were. They are true to size and very elegant. And the back strap didn’t fall off while walking.

I ordered these when I was pregnant and they fit but then after my pregnancy my feet shrank back down and they’re a bit too big. They don’t have my size so I just shove a small sock in the toe and they do fine. They look great and don’t feel cheap. I like how they go with so many different styles. True to size.

These shoes have a very classy look to them, they are just the right height, and yet the only complaint I have is that they were not as comfortable as I had hoped they would be. It is probably because my toes are very picky in the summer. Someone else might not have the challenge I had. My foot kept sliding toward the front of the shoe. I purchased some cushions to be taped inside the shoe at the heel and that did the trick.

The quality is terrible. I had to wait an extra 4 weeks because the items got stuckin customs (no biggie) but then this is how they showed up. I'm really disappointed in these $50.00 shoes with a $5 quality.

These shoes are so elegant and very comfortable. The rubber sole provides very good grip so I never feel like I'm going to slip or slide. Included in the package were some gel cushions to put in the shoes, which was an unexpected but very nice touch and definitely adds to the comfort level. I was able to wear these for several hours with no discomfort.
I ordered a UK 5, but when it arrived it fitted like a UK 3, or UK max
Cute and comfortable for my work environment!  Adorable too.
Me encantaron, lucen hermosos , un poquito grandes, soy talla 7,5, pedi 8 , pidan su talla habitual. Precio-calidad excelente! 👌🏻entregados un día antes de lo prometido , gracias 🤩

These slingback are comfy and cute. The lower heel allows for all day wear. The spectator look is still very desirable. The dark toe is a stuff but flexible material which allows for easier toe movement than a plastic or leather option. You flat heel wearers you will not go wrong if you want something a littler higher for a dressier look. The strap is not adjustable. These kicks will be a sweet addition to your cute closet looks.
I was looking for semi-short heels for work and I love these! So cute and true to size!

评论概述: SIZE DOWN!! Strap slides off the back of my foot.
评论详情: I got my normal size and the strap of the shoe slides off of my heel. I still wear them it’s just annoying to have to readjust the strap every so often. Sizing down would help.
These shoes look just like the picture and feel like they will be pretty comfy Haven't had an occasion to wear them yet but I think they'll be a great professional-chic addition for work events
Both heels looked like it wasn’t put together well. For $50 it should be better quality than this.  I’m disappointed.
These are the perfect height but quality of the shoe is mediocre and your feet will hurt after a while. They are still very stylish. Took forever to arrive.
DO NOT BUY the black bleeds into beige. NO GRIP on the bottom. SAVE YOUR MONEY
Love them Great fit too

评论概述: Gorgeous looking shoes and super comfortable.
评论详情: I’ve been looking at these shoes for some time and I finally pulled the plug as I have an event to go to next week. Unfortunately my size was going to take over a month to get to me so I decided to take a gamble on a pair that were listed “as used -in good condition” as they were going to get to me in time. The shoes I received were brand-new, in unworn, unblemished condition!  They look gorgeous on and are comfortable to walk in right out of the box. The only concern is that the back strap slips a little and I could probably have gone down a half size and been fine but then my heel would be hanging a bit over the end. I might be able to work something out with some double sided tape to fix the strap issue. Thrilled with my purchase, and you will be too.
They fit perfect. True to size

评论概述: Fabulous shoes for the money - great for wide feet
评论详情: Have hard time findng shoes fr my wide feet These fit and look great and are comfortable. And they don't look llike a "wide" shoe.

Beautiful dupe option for the CC slingbacks.  I am a true US size 8 with a narrow foot and these fit perfectly.  They seem to be comfortable to walk in for a long period of time.  I like to carry a small block heel on trips because flat shoes hurt my back after awhile because I'm used to walking in heels.  Some reviews complained about the strap falling down but I don't see that being an issue for me.The strap is very secure without being overly tight, which can make for an uncomfortable shoe.  The box included a pair of heel inserts to place inside at the ball of the foot area.
This shoe is great! Comfy, looks exactly like the photo, good quality. Even comes with a few pads to increase your comfort.

评论概述: The ankle strap isn’t adjustable but they provide the shoe filler which helped
评论详情: I had a very slight give in the ankle strap part because it’s a slip-on but once I open the provided toe filler insert (which comes in 2 pieces) I was able to secure a good fit on my heel so it did not feel loosen. I have size 8.5 wide foot and it still made me feel comfortable to wear this shoe. It’s very beautiful!

Great for the first wearing.  On the second occasion,the strap became so loose that I couldn’t keep them on my feet. The strap slipped down constantly— it wouldn’t stay in place.  I had to go barefoot back to the car. I ended up with very uncomfortable shoes for a long event. I have no idea how to save them.  Bummer!

They are nice in person. They have the durable construction. The seams look neat. They don’t look cheap. Only one problem with me is that the sling back is often fallen down my heels. I put ball of the foot cushion to help my feet not to slide down but it doesn’t work.

I typically wear a size 7.5 in woman’s shoes even tho I am truly a 7 so reading the reviews I ordered a half a size down, a 7 in woman’s and they still fit very loose so I returned them and ordered a size 6.5 in woman’s and they fit way better
Súper cómodos y de buena calidad.

Really love the versatility of this shoe- could dress either up or down and for business attire. Have worn many times, and shoes are still in great condition and quality, the only thing that I've had trouble with is on the right shoe, the strap sometimes doesn't stay up. Other than that for the price and quality I really love these shoes.
Beautiful at first and after 30 minutes of walking in them, the back of the strap is already loose and the shoe.. it caused painful rubbing. I have to return it. It’s not worth the hype.
I purchased an item and was suspicious due to the price/quality question. It exceeded the expectations, very comfy, and they look very good.

评论详情: These are elegant and comfortable tajoes
Very comfortable, fit true to size! The heel height is the perfect size too!

评论概述: Not convenient, the quality was awful.
评论详情: It was the worst shoes that I have ever had.

评论概述: lasting stylish yet professional image for multiple age groups
评论详情: I purchased this shoe for my wifes 80th . She loved it. It so good to make her happy since she has given me so much .
Super comfortable CC inspired shoes! I would order again. Fits TTS

These shoes are SO CUTE in person and very comfortable! Much more comfortable than expected and the seller even included shoe comfort inserts in case I needed them. I will definitely be purchasing from them again!
Confortable, easy to use; it's a basic
I got soooo many compliments! It's so pretty and comfortable, was able to walk the blocks around the city with no problem.

评论概述: Great heels but don't have the anti-slip outersole
评论详情: Liked them. Perfect for conferences and casual outings. But they don't have the antislip outsole, so make sure you walk in carpeted areas.

评论概述: The sling back is not tight
评论详情: The shoe is of a good quality. However the sling back is loose and will not stay on your ankle. That alone has caused me not to wear the shoe out of the house.

I was so excited to receive these shoes (the dark tan and black heels) after waiting weeks. My plan was to wear them for my 30th birthday. I was disappointed when I received them because they were so beautiful but completely unwearable. Everything about the shoe was gorgeous and comfortable but the strap was way too loose. So loose that my heel didn’t even touch the strap when my heel lifted. Therefore I am currently in the return process. If you risk to purchase, I would highly suggest sizing down.
Estaba encantada con esta compra. Pero mi pedido nunca llegó. Aparte de todo el tiempo que tuve que esperar.
Perfect addition to my office wardrobe!
I loved the shoe…… had to return them though because the strap was too big/long and could not be adjusted. Flopped on my foot and shoe could not secure.
So comfy, perfect heel height for work or just out and about- such a good Chanel dupe!
Hermosos y son fiel a la talla, los ame desde que me los puse!

评论用户: Bellos zapatos, son tan cómodos, me encantan.
评论详情: Son muy lindos y cómodos, me encantan.
These shoes are the most comfortable shoes ever.the quality is amazing.
No los he utilizado, pero no esperaba que el área negra fuera en tela.

Lovely shoes, nicely packaged, however the back strap was loose and can’t be adjusted. I usually wear a 7 and bought a 7 and they fit a little narrow for me and squished my toes too much. Can’t size up bc the back strap would really be super loose. Needs a buckle on strap to adjust.
Great shoe for work, very easy to combine. And the best thing is that it’s super confortable

评论概述: I bought it in 2 colors and one is of good quality and the other is not.
评论详情: Apparently they have different types of shoes and sell them as if they were the same, I bought a cream one which is super comfortable, good quality and looks very nice and elegant and I bought a black one which is of very poor quality, it does not feel safe when I put it on I feel I'm going to fall and the sole is too flexible, it looks totally different from the other one. The bad part is that you have no way of knowing if you are going to get a good quality one or a bad quality one, they just send you any one of them, you can be lucky or not.
The heels weee a good size and looked great however the strap was too loose. It has a loose fit to start then the elsastic give makes it too loose to ear, kept falling off my heel.

I got my normal size and these are pretty big (both length & width - I have a typical foot width all the way through, with a narrow heel). these are big. Like boxy big. still really cute & a great price point, especially as a dupe for designer and midrange shoe lines combined.  I mostly got these to see how much I would wear the style before investing in the designer alternative and they have served their purpose a lot int hat regard. I do find myself reaching for these a lot to "complete the look", I rend up swapping them out for something else, and rarely wear them because of the sizing issue.
No senti seguridad en las pisadas
Love these shoes. Comfortable all day wear and looks just like Chanel sling backs for much much less. Very stylish and very chic

I was really looking forward to receiving these shoes. However, I received them with some stains on both shoes. I tried them on and they are super cute and comfortable, just bad quality. Will try ordering again and hope I receive a better quality.
Bought when on sale super cute. I should have stuck to regular size as I went up 1/2 size and too big. Quality is great would highly recommend
beautiful!! and comfortable. My coworkers in her 50's loved them as well and got them. We both got them for work as we are expected to look professional and are on our feet
very poor quality, the shoes arrived stained, very disappointed in my purchase

评论概述: Best pair I’ve had in a while
评论详情: So comfy and cute! These shoes match for any occasion.
They are quality and classy. Plus, they fit great. I  bought others that look similar by different vendors, but did not compare. I had to return them.
These shoes are nice and fit me well. They go well with different fashion styles.
Good looking shoe
I love this shoe. It is comfortable, stylish and I love the block heel!
They’re nice and comfortable. True to size. The strap is too long but they como with some tiny soles that help fixing the strap problem

评论概述: Size up - but perfect for work / nice events
评论详情: I wore these for an internship interview and got so many compliments. My mom even thought these were Chanel! The heel is not high at all, but still is comfortable and professional. I would size up even just half a size.

These are close to resembling the designer shoe and are great if you aren’t walking around too much. The downside to me is that shoe toe was not as square as the listing photos. Mine were very round and I don’t love that look. I wear a size 11 so maybe it’s just with larger sizes.
